comments.comment: Oba thuma chiwaradariyekge thathweta path wenna epa. Othana asadarane wenne oba thumage ammata witarak nemeine. Etakota me rate inna anith ammala, ammala nemeida? Anith eka katha karanna purudu unoth hodai. Nathnam dan inna thathwetath pahalata watila ' balu' ganata watenawa. Eka oba wahanse adan inna chiwaretath ape agamatath hoda na. comments.comment: Swamin wahanse katha karana widiyath hoda naha thama. Pilosiye ayath eka ekkenata wenas widiyata nithiya kriyathmaka karanawanam ekath waradiy. Ratakata nithiyak onawenne minissunge yahapathata misak pidawata pathkaranna nemei. Eka ape rate hamoma therum aran waradi hadaganna ona. Mewage deyak balala kunuharupen comments dannenam anthima pahath rata, jathiya agamata witharak nemei thamange amma thaththatah lajja karana pawkara adabala minissu. Ehema ayatanam wadiyen me hamuduruwoi pilisiye ayai degolloma wadagath. Kenekge waradak dakkama thadin ninda karana godak aya waradiwlin pirilai inne. Poddak thamange paththa harila balanna. comments.comment: mona neethiyak unath saasanaya rakinna eka neethiyak na.hamuduvo namak yanne baila gahanna nevei.ape hama pansalakma uthum sthanayakma thibbata vadak na.ape budda puthun nathtam.api pansalata giyata vadak na bana ahanna ona.a bana vala sabaa aruthak danaganna ona.me ape agamika nayakayek.a nayakayanta yanna bari pansalak thiyanavada.muslim palliyakata yanakota kohomada muslim agamika nayakayek.me pooja pudabim thiyenne eka ekata magul natanna vath sancharaya karannavath nevei.meva vadinna.ape hamuduruvanta yanda bari nam katada yanna puluvan.

comments.comment: Kauda bn me habuduruwo athal ganna katha .me wage un hinda thama baudda sasane kanne .policiya kiyala e minissunta hama waradama patawanna baha .me policiyata nithiya hari widihata kiyathmaka karanna puluwan eth me  wage dewal wenakota wagakiyanna one ihala minissu .podi minihatai loku minihatai ekama nithiya panawanna puluwan ehema kaloth me minissunge rassawa nathi wenawa .ekama widihata thiyannanam me rate innawane konda pana nathi janadi pathi kenek agamathi kenek unge ihala niyaga denna one.ape rate podda aththam video eka thama huththa kara ganne hukana naluwo inne .pau pirenna me wage hamuduruwanta bannata mun budda sasane  kanna apu haththa
